solution_line_template: Randy has {target_age} - {current_age} = <<{target_age}-{current_age}={years_to_practice}>>{years_to_practice} years until he is 20.
He must practice {total_hours_required} / {years_to_practice} = <<{total_hours_required}/{years_to_practice}={hours_per_year}>>{hours_per_year} hours a year to become an expert.

There are {weeks_per_year} weeks in a year - {vacation_weeks} weeks of vacation Randy plans to take = <<{weeks_per_year}-{vacation_weeks}={practice_weeks}>>{practice_weeks} weeks of practice for Randy.

Randy will practice Monday - Friday, which is {days_per_week} days a week, so {practice_weeks} weeks x {days_per_week} days = <<{practice_weeks}*{days_per_week}={practice_days_per_year}>>{practice_days_per_year} days of practice each year.
Randy will need to practice {hours_per_year} / {practice_days_per_year} = <<{hours_per_year}/{practice_days_per_year}={hours_per_day}>>{hours_per_day} hours each day.
